backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with access control, blob storage mixin, and large maps for user, post, messaging, live session, marketplace, and media-related data types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping app features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose, styling, and feature integrations.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint that loads the React app and sets metadata, favicon, and root mounting point.
frontend/public/manifest.json: Web app manifest defining PWA metadata such as name, icons, colors, and start behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache management, update handling, navigation fallback, and selective asset caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app initialization with routing, providers, recovery logic, and layout including header, footer, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard that checks admin status and shows tabs for system tools like service status and storage cleanup.
frontend/src/components/AllInOneHub.tsx: Central navigation hub presenting feature shortcuts and a control to reset video layout preferences.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedDeedsBar: Animated canvas-based progress bar reacting to session duration and daily usage with warning and timeout callbacks.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedLogo.tsx: Empty placeholder component file for an animated logo.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedStars.ts: Empty placeholder component file for an animated star effect.
frontend/src/components/BlogCard.tsx: Displays an individual blog post with author info, media indicators, truncated content, and a profile modal.
frontend/src/components/BlogPage.tsx: Renders the blog list with sorting, loading states, empty state messaging, and a modal to create new blogs.
frontend/src/components/ChallengesSectio: Shows weekly challenges, joining and sharing actions, mock leaderboard, and user badges with UI dialogs.
Renders a comment input form and a list of sorted comments with avatars and timestamps. Comment submission is stubbed with a toast notification.
frontend/src/components/CreateBlogButton: Provides a button that toggles the visibility of the CreateBlogModal. Used to start creating a new blog post.
Modal for creating blog posts with title, content, categories, tags, media uploads, and live toggle. Handles media previews, size checks, upload progress, and blog submission.
frontend/src/components/CreateMarketplac: Modal for creating marketplace posts with fields for details, category, post type, and an optional media upload. Validates inputs, handles media processing, and submits the post.
frontend/src/components/CreatePostButton: Button that opens the CreatePostModal for sharing a good deed post. Includes styled presentation and modal toggle behavior.
Modal for creating posts with caption, category, optional image or video, and visual adjustments. Handles media validation, previews, upload progress, and post submission.
frontend/src/components/DeedsBar.tsx: Displays session and daily usage timers with battery-style indicators and warnings. Triggers callbacks when nearing or reaching session limits.
frontend/src/components/DiscoverFeed.tsx: Displays a Discover feed with horizontal filter buttons and sorted, filtered posts including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/Feed.tsx: Renders the main feed with filters, sorting by timestamp, post creation button, and fallbacks for loading or empty lists.
frontend/src/components/FollowersModal.t: Shows a modal listing a user's followers with profile info, loading state, and avatar fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/FollowingModal.t: Shows a modal listing accounts the user follows with profile data and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with dynamic year, branding, and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FriendsStatusFee: Displays status updates from followed users with sorting, timestamps, and detailed loading or empty states.
frontend/src/components/Gate.tsx: Implements the landing page with branding, blog search, trending blogs, and various feature sections, managing search and user selection state.
frontend/src/components/GradeDeedsRating: Displays a user’s rating report card with mock data and allows friends to submit ratings via a modal.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with navigation, language selector, and login/logout controls using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/IconBadge.tsx: Provides a configurable icon-with-label badge component supporting size and style variants.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Shows a language picker dialog allowing users to switch app languages with flags and selection state.
frontend/src/components/LiveChatPanel.ts: Implements live chat for a session, displaying comments and allowing users to send new messages.
frontend/src/components/LiveFeed.tsx: Lists active live sessions, lets users start a live stream, and open viewer modals for existing streams.
Displays a modal with a placeholder live video viewer and an integrated chat panel for a selected session.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with branding, benefits list, and loading overlay.
frontend/src/components/LogoShowcase.tsx: Empty placeholder component with no content provided.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Marketplace view with tabs, sorting, post fetching, and modal for creating new posts.
Displays a single marketplace post with author info, category, actions, and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/components/Messages.tsx: Messaging UI for selecting followed users and sending direct messages.
frontend/src/components/ModerationWarnin: Displays a styled warning banner encouraging positive behavior.
frontend/src/components/NotificationsPan: Modal listing notifications with sorting, timestamps, and mark-as-read actions.
frontend/src/components/PhotoTextReelCar: Displays a full-screen reel-style post with photo, caption, author info, category label, and action overlay, with support for flagged content warnings and profile modal.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Renders a feed-style post card with author info, category tags, media, moderation banner, and reaction buttons.
frontend/src/components/Profile.tsx: Implements the main user profile page with posts, followers, notifications, profile editing, and media upload handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Provides a modal for initial user profile setup, allowing entry of name, bio, and optional profile picture upload.
Adds spark, inspire, comment, and share interactions to posts, with toast feedback and comment toggling.
frontend/src/components/ReelActionOverla: Shows floating spark, inspire, comment, and share buttons on reel posts, triggering toast responses and like mutations.
frontend/src/components/ReelBottomNav.ts: Deprecated bottom navigation bar rendering icons and routing actions, with a modal trigger for creating posts.
frontend/src/components/ReelBottomTabNav: Tab-style bottom navigation with active state highlighting, keyboard support, and a create-post modal trigger.
frontend/src/components/SafeImageIcon.ts: Image component that falls back to an icon or text when the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/Search.tsx: Search form with input and button that triggers a callback when a term is submitted.
frontend/src/components/ServiceStatusChe: Checks backend service health via actor call, displays status, errors, and admin-only photo system details.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonBlog.tsx: Skeleton loader showing placeholder layout for a blog card with header, content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonMarketpl: Skeleton loader simulating a detailed marketplace item card with images, text, and actions.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonPost.tsx: Skeleton loader showing a simplified post layout with header, text, and image placeholder.
frontend/src/components/Space.tsx: Static page describing a space-themed environment with customization and atmosphere info cards.
frontend/src/components/StarEffectLogo.t: Canvas-based animated star effect rendered around a logo image using a particle system.
frontend/src/components/StartLiveModal.t: Modal that initializes camera/mic, lets users start or end a live session, and shows a live video preview with controls.
frontend/src/components/StartupRecoveryS: Recovery screen prompting users to clear cache and reload when the app is stuck or an update fails.
frontend/src/components/StorageCleanup.t: UI for running storage health checks and deep cleanup operations with progress feedback and result display.
frontend/src/components/TopLevelErrorBou: Error boundary that catches top-level React errors and shows a reload prompt with optional error details.
Sidebar showing trending hashtags and top users derived from all posts.
frontend/src/components/UpdateAvailableB: Banner notifying users of an available update with options to update or perform full cache recovery if needed.
frontend/src/components/UpdateStatusModa: Modal for updating user status with text, image upload, and music attachment handling.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileModal: Displays a user's profile, posts, and follow info with modal UI and profile details.
frontend/src/components/VideoModeReel.ts: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/VideoReelCard.ts: Renders a video post card with autoplay, mute controls, author info, reactions, and modal profile view.
frontend/src/components/WeatherBackgroun: Canvas-based animated weather background rendering particles and gradients based on current conditions.
frontend/src/components/WheelNavScroller: Empty component file with no content.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides language selection and translation context with predefined translation dictionaries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeedsUsage.ts: Tracks session and daily usage time using localStorage and sessionStorage, updating periodically.
frontend/src/hooks/useHorizontalWheelScr: Converts vertical wheel scrolling to horizontal scrolling for a given element unless interacting with buttons or links.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, albums, music attachments, and status updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerUpdat: Detects service worker updates, handles activation, stale state checks, and guarded page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeather.ts: Fetches weather and sun cycle data based on geolocation, with fallbacks and periodic updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, dark mode styles, and custom utility classes for UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/utils/swRecovery.ts: Provides utilities to clear caches, unregister service workers, manage recovery cooldown state, and perform a full SW recovery with reload.
frontend/src/utils/swReloadGuard.ts: Tracks and limits service-worker-triggered reloads using a session reload counter.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL/hash.
frontend/src/utils/videoLayoutPersistenc: Removes legacy video/reel layout keys from storage and can reload the app; also detects if legacy state exists.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, radii, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current rollback goals, feature restoration requirements, and pending requests.
